title.narrative: Central Asia Regional Economic Cooperation (CAREC) Transport Corridor 1 (Zhambyl Oblast Section) Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: The Project will reconstruct 79 km of highway sections km 310.5 - 389.4, and construct road maintenance facilities in 4 sites along the corridor. This will contribute in sustaining economic development and increaseing domestic and international trade growth within Kazakhstan and between Kazakhstan and its trading partners.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Development of an efficient transport network in Zhambyl Oblast

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reduced average travel time through Zhambyl Oblast between the southern Kazakhstan border and Otar to 6 hours by 2015 from 10 hours

description.narrative: Development of an efficient transport network in Zhambyl Oblast

title.narrative: Increased average traffic volume to 4,000 vpd in 2014 from 2,500 vpd in 2007

description.narrative: Development of an efficient transport network in Zhambyl Oblast
